Title: Sixty years of the great Chinese Communist Party 1921-1981
Notes: Part of a series marking the 60th anniversary of the CCP. Subtitled "Carrying out comprehensive construction and achieving great results" (全面展开建设取得巨大成就), this second part (of three) covers "The period of comprehensive construction of socialism began 1957-1966" (开始全面建设社会主义时期 1957-1966).It shows the formation of People's Communes (1958); discussions about the Great Leap Forward between Mao Zedong, Liu Shaoqi, Zhou Enlai, Chen Yun and Deng Xiaoping; bumper harvests; backyard furnaces; the session of the NPC calling for the modernization of agriculture, industry, national defense, and science and technology (Winter 1963-1964); and the first Learn from Lei Feng campaign (1963).
Theme: The Founding of the Chinese Communist Party (1921)Great Leap Forward (1958-1961)Liu ShaoqiZhou EnlaiChen YunDeng XiaopingLei Feng
